response.overview: Encounter nature’s sculpted steamy terraces, sputtering and bubbling geysers, and petrified trees. Meet the year-round residents of the parks: bears, bison, beavers, bald eagles, coyotes, playful otters, and some of the world’s largest elk herds. Relive a rich history, from original Indian inhabitants to the earliest explorers. And witness the variety of summer and winter activities that bring visitors back again and again.  Mammoth Hot Springs.  Old Faithful.  Yellowstone Lake.  Hayden Valley.  Specimen Ridge.  Norris Geyser Basin, the Grand Canyon of Yellowstone.  Inspiration Point.  Artist Point.  History of the Native-American Inhabitants and Explorers.  Wildlife.  Extra Features:  Wolves Return to Yellowstone.  Wild Fires in Yellowstone.
response.tagline: The Premier National Parks in High Definition
response.title: Scenic National Parks: Yellowstone
